title: Volcanic Disaster Understanding and Scientific Literacy Enhancement Module Utilizing Local Wisdom

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: For office/administrative professionals, connecting volcanic disaster scenarios with community response strategies to enhance scientific problem-solving skills via mathematical modeling and data analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the causes and impacts of volcanic disasters using mathematical models (e.g., probability distributions, risk map analysis)
Learners can design disaster response strategies tailored to local community characteristics and apply core elements of scientific literacy (evidence evaluation, decision-making)
Learners can complete creative projects integrating local wisdom extracted from historical volcanic cases (e.g., Mount Klyuchevskoy) into modern scientific approaches
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
